comment.author: 15775224@N08
comment._content: This is my Grandfather.  I was very surprised to see this.  Wow the internet is truly amazing.  Toni Cawthorne

comment.author: 38561291@N04
comment._content: Glad you came across the photo. I would certainly be interested in any information that you may have about his legal career. Feel free to contact me at: pleather@lsuc.on.ca
comment.authorname: Law Society of Upper Canada Archives

comment.author: 63400402@N05
comment._content: I am wondering if this is the Frederick Cawthorne born on 10 December 1897 in Sheffield, England, and who emigrated to Canada in 1907?

comment.author: 38561291@N04
comment._content: His birth date is recorded as December 10th, 1897, although we have no idea where he was born or when he came to Canada.
comment.authorname: Law Society of Upper Canada Archives

comment.author: 15775224@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/63400402@N05] Hi Sherry didn't see your post until now.  Yes I believe he would be one and the same.  Do you know him or know of him?  I would be very interested in any information you have.  My email is:  ToniL@rogers.com  I look foward to hearing from you.

comment.author: 15775224@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/lsuc_archives]   Hi, what would you like to know?  I would be happy to provide information to you.  Toni
